title: England must follow New Zealand's lead and land the opening heavy blow
text:
Ever since Eddie Jones has come in, he has used New Zealand as England’s reference point for where he wants to take the team. That is not about copying the All Blacks – he has always wanted England to be England – but knowing what their standards are and looking to surpass them.

Ultimately, they are the No 1 team in the world. Whatever the rankings say, they have been the best team on the planet for the past eight years; probably longer. If the goal is to overtake them, then you have to know what they are doing. All roads go through them if you want to be world champions.

A fast start will be crucial. Eddie talks about the hit-first mentality. Throwing the first punch, not taking a backward step,...
description: Ever since Eddie Jones has come in, he has used New Zealand as England’s reference point for where he wants to take the team.
